Text: Superseeding this file.. Amount of Seeders might be bogus :)
So many people has downloaded this torrent, but yet there's so few who's seeding. Why?
because people don't care about seeding cecilia. they just want their movie. i usually seed for 2 days after i download a flick...
Love it, best movie on looong time! see it!!

Okay, where to begin with this download:

- In the beginning of the video file, there is a disclaimer referencing that, "Piracy is Illegal. This copy is for the recipient only. Not to be sold, copied, or given away..."

- Following the above is the FBI Anti-Piracy warning that is common on all DVD and Blu-Ray releases.

- Following the above is a "Special Awards Viewing" message from Universal Studios, Inc.

- Finally, 35 seconds after the beginning of the video file, the movie starts.

- The screen resolution is ridiculous. 720*576; however, if one goes to full screen, the movie sits dead in the middle of the screen with a thick black border around each edge of the viewing area.

- The audio is dull and distorted.

I would advise anyone to stay away from this download. There are way too many other viable options.
